item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ski Review
item.dc:creator: Exporter
item.content:encoded:
• Product Description
  • Conditions
  • Your Experience
  • General Opinion

Product Description

Fill out the relevant product information for the product you are reviewing

Conditions

Describe the conditions you tested this product in.

Your Experience

Describe your experience using the ski.

General Questions

Open-ended questions and recommendations.

item.title: Skiing Know Thyself
item.dc:creator: Exporter
item.content:encoded:
This form is used only as a user exercise. The information in this form will not be shared with other users and will not be displayed on the site.

The purpose of this form is to help users reflect on what type of skier they are and what type of experience they are looking for.

  • Skiing Style
  • Confidence in Different Terrain/Conditions
  • Style: Finesse vs Power
  • Technical Proficiency
  • Ski Attributes
  • Ski Preferences

Skiing Style

Describe your style of skiing! Are you a aggressive skier or a conservative skier?

Confidence in Different Terrain/Conditions

For each condition below select one comfort level from the list of options.

Style: Finesse Vs Power

Describe your skiing style: Are you a power oriented skier or a finesse oriented skier?

Technical Proficiency

How would you rank your technical proficiency in different terrain/conditions? (For each condition below select a level of technical proficiency from the list of options)

Ski Attributes

What are the attributes you tend to want most from a ski? (select one option from the list of options for each attribute)

Ski preferences

Outline some more nuanced ski preferences
